document.bingtitle: What do call someone who works at a fast food restaurant
document.webtitle: What do call someone who works at a fast food restaurantWhat do call someone who works at a fast food restaurant
document.description: What do you call someone who sells food in a restaurant? Daniel Studley. Do you work inside at a fast food restaurant? Yes you do. What is in fast food restaurant food?
document.body:

Home Answers.com > Wiki Answers > Categories > Jobs&Education > Jobs > What do call someone who works at a fast food restaurant? What do call someone who works at a fast food restaurant? In: Jobs , McDonald's [ Edit categories ]
Answer:
Employee
First answer by Rrjmd . Last edit by Rrjmd . Contributor trust : 17 [ recommend contributor recommended ]. Question popularity : 2 [ recommend question ]. [ report abuse ] Can you answer these Jobs questions?

Relevant answers:
What do you call someone who sells food in a restaurant ? Daniel Studley. Do you work inside at a fast food restaurant ? Yes you do. What is in fast food restaurant food ? It is helpful to understand what the government allows in feed or to be used in conventional production: Dairy cows - antibiotics, pig&chicken byproducts, hormones (for growth), pesticides,... How old do you have to be to work at a fast food restaurant in the US? I'm pretty sure it is 17. How many people work in fast food restaurants ? In the usa 3,036,000
